subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson’s victory at the Masters  on Sunday, mixed with Tiger Woods’s return to competitive golf after five months, attracted an average viewership of 16.7 million, up from 14.3 million last year.
snippet: Phil Mickelson’s victory at the Masters  on Sunday, mixed with Tiger Woods’s return to competitive golf after five months, attracted an average viewership of 16.7 million, up from 14.3 million last year.
